achievements.name: Job Novice
achievements.description: Reach level 25 in any combat job.

achievements.name: Job Journeyman
achievements.description: Reach level 50 in any combat job.

achievements.name: Job Expert
achievements.description: Reach level 75 in any combat job.

achievements.name: Job Master
achievements.description: Reach level 99 in any combat job.

achievements.name: Jack of All Trades
achievements.description: Reach level 25 in 5 different combat jobs.

achievements.name: Versatile Adventurer
achievements.description: Reach level 50 in 5 different combat jobs.

achievements.name: Master of All
achievements.description: Reach level 99 in 5 different combat jobs.

achievements.name: Flawless Victory
achievements.description: Win a battle without taking damage.

achievements.name: Speed Demon
achievements.description: Win a battle in under 10 seconds.

achievements.name: Survivor
achievements.description: Win a battle with less than 10% HP remaining.

achievements.name: Gauntlet Warrior
achievements.description: Complete The Gauntlet on a higher difficulty.

achievements.name: Gauntlet Champion
achievements.description: Complete The Gauntlet on the highest difficulty.

achievements.name: Matching Set
achievements.description: Activate your first equipment set bonus.

achievements.name: Complete Ensemble
achievements.description: Activate a complete equipment set bonus.

achievements.name: Master of Craft
achievements.description: Reach level 25 with any passive job.

achievements.name: Grandmaster
achievements.description: Reach level 50 with any passive job.

achievements.name: Jack of All Masters
achievements.description: Unlock all master tier combat jobs.

achievements.name: Monster Expert
achievements.description: Reach 1,000 mastery on a single monster.

achievements.name: Monster Nemesis
achievements.description: Reach 5,000 mastery on a single monster.

achievements.name: Eternal Nemesis
achievements.description: Reach 10,000 mastery on a single monster.

achievements.name: Boss Slayer's Arsenal
achievements.description: Complete a full set of boss material equipment.

achievements.name: Expert Smith
achievements.description: Reach level 25 with the Smith job.

achievements.name: Master Smith
achievements.description: Reach level 50 with the Smith job.

achievements.name: Legendary Smith
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Smith job.

achievements.name: Legendary Miner Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Miner job.

achievements.name: Legendary Lumberjack Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Lumberjack job.

achievements.name: Legendary Herbalist Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Herbalist job.

achievements.name: Legendary Fisherman Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Fisherman job.

achievements.name: Legendary Chef Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Chef job.

achievements.name: Legendary Crafter Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Crafter job.

achievements.name: Legendary Fletcher Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Fletcher job.

achievements.name: Legendary Runecrafter Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Runecrafter job.

achievements.name: Legendary Summoner Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Summoner job.

achievements.name: Legendary Farmer Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Farmer job.

achievements.name: Legendary Firemaker Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Firemaker job.

achievements.name: Legendary Astrologist Achievement
achievements.description: Reach level 75 with the Astrologist job.

achievements.name: Master of Trades
achievements.description: Reach level 25 with all passive jobs.

achievements.name: Grandmaster of All
achievements.description: Unlock all grandmaster tier passive jobs.

achievements.name: Legend Among Legends
achievements.description: Unlock all legendary tier passive jobs.
